GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.26 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
Input: sparcspkr - fix refcount leak in bbc_beep_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit bbc2b0ce6042dd3117827f10ea8cb67e0ab786da, it was introduced in version v2.6.26 by commit 9c1a5077fdca99356c891af37931e537dea874f5. For more details please see the references link.
